channel.title: How do i?
channel.description: hey people how do i port forward please help me please i NEVER did it before and i even went on portforward.com and it still didint work because i didint understand it so please help me please! thx if you do help me. o ya i have NETGEAR router.

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

go to portforward.com, then click guides at the top left hand next to home scroll down under the first section look for portforwarding guides by router. then search for ur router type, after u find that on the 3rd paragraph of next page u should see

If you do not see the program you are forwarding ports for, be sure to visit our Default Guide for this router

click default guide. and try that. it explains everything to do

Read full topic
